text.tspan: Within the living room, there is no keyboard or mouse, not
to mention the advanced 3-D input devices traditionally
used for 3D user interfaces. Even within the scope of
remote controls, there are very complex and very simple
examples. Apple Inc.'s "Front Row" remote control has

interface is designed to work with
only a small number of buttons.
button are the only ones required
